mapper.sql: id, kpi_main_id, index_num, task_direction, task_weight, task_score, status

kec.id, kec.kpi_main_id as kpiMainId, kec.index_num as indexNum, kec.task_direction as taskDirection, kec.task_weight as taskWeight, kec.task_score as taskScore, kec.status, kec.task_content as taskContent
mapper.insert: insert into kpi_enactment_cultural (id, kpi_main_id, index_num, task_direction, task_weight, task_score, status, task_content) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{kpiMainId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{indexNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update kpi_enactment_cultural
kpi_main_id = #{kpiMainId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
index_num = #{indexNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_direction = #{taskDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_weight = #{taskWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_score = #{taskScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_content = #{taskContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update kpi_enactment_cultural set kpi_main_id = #{kpiMainId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, index_num = #{indexNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_direction = #{taskDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_weight = #{taskWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_score = #{taskScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_content = #{taskContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update kpi_enactment_cultural set kpi_main_id = #{kpiMainId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, index_num = #{indexNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_direction = #{taskDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_weight = #{taskWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_score = #{taskScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from kpi_enactment_cultural kec left join kpi_main kma on kma.id = kec.kpi_main_id where kma.processinstance_id = #{processinstance_id}
